description: Sends a password reset email to the user with a reset token. The email contains a link to reset the password.

email.description: The email address of the user to send a password reset email to

redirectTo.description: The URL to redirect the user to reset their password. If the token isn't valid or expired, it'll be redirected with `?error=INVALID_TOKEN`. If the token is valid, it'll be redirected with `?token=VALID_TOKEN`

status.description: Indicates password reset email was sent

x-specs.then: Returns 200 OK and sends reset email with token
